sentences.en: He pleaded guilty to wilful dereliction of duty.
sentences.cn: 他承认犯有玩忽职守罪。

sentences.en: He was found guilty of gross dereliction of duty.
He was reduced to ordinary soldier due to a serious dereliction of duty.
sentences.cn: 他因严重失职被降为普通士兵.

sentences.en: His criticisms of their dereliction of duty were right on the button.
sentences.cn: 他批评他们玩忽职守,这是很中肯的.

sentences.en: Official state media say the two mine officials were detained for alleged dereliction of duty.
sentences.cn: 中国官方媒体报导,两名煤矿官员因被控玩忽职守而被拘留.

sentences.en: Other conducts involving abusing authority, dereliction of duty and playing favoritism and committing irregularities.
sentences.cn: (五)其他滥用职权 、 玩忽职守、徇私舞弊的行为.

sentences.en: The previous owners had rescued the building from dereliction.
sentences.cn: 这座建筑之前的业主将其从破败不堪的状况中挽救了出来。

sentences.en: This policeman was punished for his dereliction of duty.
sentences.cn: 这名警察因玩忽职守罪被判了刑.

words.tran_cn: 玩忽职守的；无主的；被抛弃了的
遗弃物；玩忽职守者；被遗弃的人

trans.tran_en: when someone fails to do what they should do as part of their job
